This test verifies the hit test regions given to the compositor specifically around non-composited overflow scroll elements.

scrollContent: #document (13, 52, 290, 32)

scrollContainerWithHandler: #document (13, 89, 290, 32)

nestedContent: #document (13, 126, 290, 32)
nestedContent: #document (15, 158, 256, 2)

fixedPositionContentContainer: #document (13, 168, 290, 32)
fixedPositionContentContainer: #document (310, 190, 132, 12)

overflowwithhandler: #document (13, 210, 290, 32)
overflowwithhandler: #document (14, 242, 273, 6)

divInsideNonScrollableLayer: #document (13, 252, 290, 32)
divInsideNonScrollableLayer: #document (14, 284, 273, 1)

divInsideCompositedLayer: DIV#compositedLayer (0, 10, 273, 12)

overflowwithborder: #document (13, 336, 290, 50)
